prompt: Make a website for a institute that primarily focuces on coding, development and DSA.
refinedPrompt: Create a website for CodeTech Institute, an educational organization specializing in coding, software development, and data structures and algorithms (DSA). The website should have a modern, tech-savvy design and include the following pages: Home, About Us, Courses (Coding, Web Development, DSA), Faculty, Events, and Contact Us. Implement a user-friendly navigation menu, a course enrollment form, and a blog featuring the latest industry trends and student success stories. Optimize the website for search engines and ensure it is responsive across various devices.
